data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 4, Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Roma.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 5, Genoa have a goal kick.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Genoa's Miha Zajc has been booked in Genoa.
In the minute 7, Roma's Roger Ibanez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Roma.
Roma's Roger Ibanez is on target but unsuccessful.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Roma at Luigi Ferraris.
Lorenzo Pellegrini for Roma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 14, Bruno Peres is on a sub for Leonardo Spinazzola for Roma.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in Genoa.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Roma have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Pedro for Roma drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Genoa Genoa drive forward through Lukas Lerager. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 23, Massimiliano Irrati awards Genoa a goal kick.
Roger Ibanez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 26, Roma drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Roma.
Important block from the Roma defence as Gianluca Scamacca fires in a strike for Genoa.
In the minute 29, Massimiliano Irrati awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Genoa Roma drive forward through Bruno Peres. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Rick Karsdorp gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Genoa defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Genoa.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In Genoa, Borja Mayoral of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Roma have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In Genoa, Roma push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Genoa's Miha Zajc gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 45, Massimiliano Irrati blows to end the first-half.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan heads in to make it 0-1 at Luigi Ferraris.
Great play from Jordan Veretout to set up the goal.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 47, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Roma pushes forward through Bruno Peres, whose finish on goal is saved.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 48, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Marko Pjaca.
Gianluca Scamacca instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 52, Free kick Genoa.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a Roma throw-in in Genoa's half.
Attention is being given to Romaâ€™s Rick Karsdorp and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 54, Rick Karsdorp is back on his feet again.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Roma.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 57, Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 58, Genoa are pushing forward but Gianluca Scamacca's finish is wide of the goal.
Roma have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a second substitution, with Bryan Cristante replacing Borja Mayoral.
The home team replace Marko Pjaca with Goran Pandev.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 63, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 64, Roma drives forward and Bruno Peres gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in Roma.
In the minute 66, Massimiliano Irrati signals a Roma throw-in in Genoa's half.
Goal! Roma have got their heads in front thanks to a Henrikh Mkhitaryan strike.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Peres.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Roma.
Free kick Genoa.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Roma.
In the minute 69, Genoa to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Paolo Ghiglione is replacing Andrea Masiello for the home team.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Genoa make their third substitution with Luca Pellegrini replacing Ivan Radovanovic.
In the minute 70, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jordan Veretout for Roma who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jordan Veretout has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 73, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In Genoa Roma attack through Bryan Cristante. The finish is off target, however.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the home team a throw-in.
Roma's Jordan Veretout gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Genoa defender.
In the minute 76, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luca Pellegrini for Genoa drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
The home team have replaced Lukas Lerager with Mattia Destro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
The home team replace Miha Zajc with Milan Badelj.
In the minute 82, Mattia Destro of Genoa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Roma at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Goal! Henrikh Mkhitaryan extends Roma's lead to 1-3.
Pedro with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa.
Genoa are caught offside.
Roma make their third substitution with Gonzalo Villar replacing Lorenzo Pellegrini.
In the minute 88, Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa push upfield but Massimiliano Irrati quickly pulls them for offside.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Genoa pushes forward through Mattia Destro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
